Hi, I'm James Cool and I'm a web developer. I'm interested in task runners, scaffolding tools, responsive design, and templating languages. I like JavaScript. I'm also interested in formal logic. In my spare time, I write music in order to keep myself away from philosophy.

If you're interested in seeing other things I've done, please visit jeffreysbrother.com. To see additional projects, experiments, and exercises, please visit my GitHub account. You can also find me on Treehouse.

My résumé is available here.
